text: Freedom from want cannot be fulfilled nor freedom from fear, fear of starvation in the midst of plenty. Help will not be easily forthcoming for the people in need. They will think of the animals first (which is of course our duty). Of course the individual will eat and be full but: 'Take heed to yourself, that your heart be not deceived, and ye turn aside, and serve other gods, and worship them', the yourself is thy greatest enemy, the self-seeking self.
handwritten_text: Freedom from want cannot be fulfilled nor freedom from fear, fear of starvation in the midst of plenty. Help will not be easily forthcoming for the people in need. They will think of the animals first (which is of course our duty). Of course the individual will eat and be full but: 'Take heed to yourself, that your heart be not deceived, and ye turn aside, and serve other gods, and worship them', the yourself is thy greatest enemy, the self-seeking self.
